text: Victoria "Tori" Herridge (born 1980) is a female paleontologist who was born in Britain. She works for the Natural History Museum in London. ==Early life== Herridge spent most of her childhood in Sussex in England. ==Career== She got a first class biology degree at university in 2002. In 2015, she was in the documentary T. Rex Autopsy. Category:Pages created with the Article Wizard from 2017 Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:British palaeontologists
title: Victoria Herridge
